Elham joined CCWJ in October 2018 as a visiting professor. She is currently a Research Associate at National Research Council of Canada.

##### Prior Degrees

PhD, Mechanical Engineering, 2016

##### Project

*Study of the growth mechanism of chromium carbide overlays by electron microscopy techniques*

Due to the excellent wear and corrosion resistance, carbide overlays are very important in various industries including oil sands, agriculture and mining.
